caller_intent: Frederick Johnson wants to confirm whether his Cincinnati Insurance policy was canceled or reactivated after receiving a refund check and ensure he has active coverage on his property.
resolution_steps: Agent acknowledges the refund check and letter from Cincinnati Insurance.
Agent confirms the policy was reactivated but clarifies the check was sent due to cancellation processing.
Agent offers to contact Cincinnati Insurance to verify the policy status and provide a callback.
knowledge_required: Handling refund checks for unearned premiums
Communicating with carriers to verify policy status
summary: Frederick Johnson received a refund check from Cincinnati Insurance after a policy cancellation but believes the policy was reactivated. The agent will verify the policy status with Cincinnati Insurance and provide a callback to resolve the discrepancy and confirm coverage.
